name: BatchReadPartnerClients
description:
Fetch batch details of partner clients in HubSpot CRM.

Use this tool to retrieve information for multiple partner clients at once from HubSpot CRM. Ideal for scenarios where bulk data about partner clients is needed.

parameters.name: partner_clients_request_body
parameters.description: JSON object containing partner client details such as properties with history, id properties, inputs, and properties to retrieve batch data.

propertiesWithHistory.description: Key-value pairs for setting properties for the new object and their histories.

idProperty.description: When using a custom unique value property to retrieve records, the name of the property. Do not include this parameter if retrieving by record ID.

properties.description: Key-value pairs for setting properties for the new object.

parameters.name: include_archived
parameters.description: Set to true to include archived partner clients in the batch results. Default is false.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_crm API.

propertiesWithHistory.description: Key-value pairs for setting properties for the new object and their histories.

idProperty.description: When using a custom unique value property to retrieve records, the name of the property. Do not include this parameter if retrieving by record ID.

properties.description: Key-value pairs for setting properties for the new object.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
